response.overview: An experimental take on Shakespeare's MEASURE FOR MEASURE. Many actors in the cast play two roles wile some parts are played by two actors. The classic problem play is framed by a fictional film musical about a 1950s housewife and mockumentary footage set during its production and leading up to its tenth anniversary - while the dialogue and story are peppered with lines from other Shakespeare works. Made with mostly consumer-grade equipment over more than 20 years, it also illustrates the evolution of the way most of us see things - while providing glimpses behind the scenes, both real and staged.
response.title: Live Ashes
